titleStmt.title: SII 12.222: original edition by V. Venkatasubba Ayyar
No. 222. (A.R. No. 54 of 1930-31). TIRUKKŌḌIKĀVAL, KUMBAKONAM TALUK, TANJORE DISTRICT. ON THE EAST WALL (OUTSIDE) OF THE FIRST PRĀKĀRA IN THE TIRUKKŌḌĪŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This inscription, also dated in the 22nd year, registers a remission deed (iṟaimuṟaipramāṇa-iśaivu-tīṭṭu) given by the dēvakaṉmis of the temple at Tirukkōḍikā in Nallāṟṟūr-nāḍu, a subdivision of Virudarājabhayaṅkara-vaḷanāḍu, to Maṉuvūruḍaiyār Varantarum Kūttapperumāḷ residing at Gaṅgaikoṇḍaśōḻapuram. The latter set up the image of Tirupperunduṟai-Āḷuḍaiyār in the temple and presented 200 kuḻi of tax-free land and 150 kāśu for expenses to the temple authorities.
The date of the record, according to the details given, is A.D. 1264, October 9, Thursday, the month being Tulā which is damaged in the inscription.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . cakalapuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrī kopperuñciṅkatevarkku yāṇṭu 2 10 2 Irupattiraṇṭāvatu Aparapakṣattu tritiyaiyum viyāḻakkiḻa
maiyum peṟṟa Urocaṇināḷ virutarājapayaṅkaravaḷanāṭṭu nallāṟṟūrnāṭṭu Uṭaiyār tirukkoṭikāvuṭaiyār ko var tevakaṉmikaḷom Iṟaimuṟai
p piramāṇa Icaivutiṭṭu . gaṅkaikoṇṭacoḻapurattu Irukkum maṉuvūruṭaiyār varantarum kūttapperumāḷukku Iṉṉāyaṉār tevatāṉam tirukkoṭikāvil tiyā
kaviṉotaviḻupparaiyar kāṇiyāṉa Aṟupatu varicaiyum Antarāyamum Iṟukkum kollaiyil Ivar pakkal vilaikoṇṭa nilam Araimāvum Ivar taṅkaḷ kurukkaḷ varam
tarum kūttapperumāḷukkut dāṉamākak kuṭutta nilam Araimāvum Āka nilam Oru māviṉāl kuḻi nūṟum Ikkuḻi nūṟum Ippaṭiyāl koṇṭu kurustāṉamākat tiruppe
runtuṟai Āḷuṭaiyārait tevar svāmitevar tirumukamum koṇṭuvantu Iṉṉāyaṉār koyil stāṉattārkkum Ivvūrt tirukkākkaḷḷi niyāyattārkkum kāṭṭi Ivar
kaḷoṭum kūṭat tirupperuntuṟai Āḷuṭaiyārai pratiṣṭittamaiyil Iṉṉilakkuḻi nūṟṟukkum nellu Aṟukalattukkum Iṉṉilakkuḻi nūṟum śrī koyilum tirumuṟṟamum Ākaiyi
l Iṉṉilattāl nellu Iṟaiyili ceyyaveṇṭukaiyil Innellu Aṟukalattukkum Iṉṉāyaṉār tevatāṉam kaṇṇamaṅkalam nūṟṟu Aṟupatin kalavaricai Iṟukkum nilattu te
varkku Iṟaimuṟaimaiyāl varum nellu nikki Iṟaimikuti varum nellu Aṟukalattukkum paṟṟi Innilakkuḻi nūṟṟukku koṇṭu viṭṭa nilakkuḻi Irunūṟṟiṉāl
lukku Uṭalāka koṇṭu Ikkollai nilak kuḻi nūṟum Ivar Eḻuntaruḷuvitta tirupperuntuṟai Āḷuṭaiyār Iṟaiyiliyāka Aṉupavikkakaṭavarākavum Ikkollai
ṉāl Iṟukkum nellu Aṟukalattukku Iṉṉāyaṉār tevatāṉam kaṇṇamaṅkalattuk koṇṭu viṭṭakuḻi Irunūṟṟiṉāl nilam Iraṇṭu māvum tirunāmattukkāṇiyāka Iṉṉāyaṉār Aṉupavikka
kaṭaivarākavum cammatittu Iṟaimuṟaimai pramāṇam paṇṇiṉamaiyil Iṉṉilam Iraṇṭu māvukkum Uyyakkoṇṭārvaḷanāṭṭu tirunākiśvarattu Irukkum viyāpārikaḷil cirāmaṉ marutāntu kiḻavaṉ vitiviṭaṅkap
perumāḷ pakkal vilaikoṇṭa pramāṇam Uṭaiyār tirukkoṭikāvuṭaiya nāyaṉār śrīpaṇṭārattu Oṭukkiṉamaiyil muṉṉāḷil tirupperuntuṟai Āvuṭaiyārai pratiṣṭikkiṟa Iṭattu Iṉṉāyaṉār tevatāṉam tiru
kkoṭikāvil kollainilattu vilaikoṇṭa tāṉattālum tiyākaviṉotaviḻupparaiyar pakkal peṟṟa kuḻi nūṟṟiṉāl nellu Aṟukalattukkum nellu Iṟuttal Iṉṉilattukku niṅkalāka vanta 2 � Innilam
Iraṇṭumāvum tirunāmattukkāṇiyākak koṇṭu tarutal ceyyaveṇum Eṉṟu Ikkoyil tāṉattārum śrīmāhēśvararum co Ippaṭiyāka vanta nilam Iraṇṭu māvum Iṉṉāyaṉār tevatā
ṉatte tirunāmattukkāṇiyākak koṇṭu viṭuvatākavum Ikkollai nilak kuḻi nūṟṟiṉāl Iṟukkum nellu Ittirupperuntuṟai Āvuṭaiyārkku I kaṭavutākavum Itti yākaviṉotaviḻupparaiyar śrī paṇṭārattukku tiṭṭu
t tarukaiyil Iṉṉilakkuḻi Irunūṟṟukkum marutāntu kiḻavaṉ vitiviṭaṅkapperumāṉ pakkal koṇṭu tirunāmattukkāṇiyāka viṭṭu vilaikoṇṭa mum cipaṇṭārattu Oṭukki Ittiyākaviṉotaviḻupparaiyar Iṭṭa tiṭṭum śrīpa
ṇṭārattiniṉṟum Ivarkkup puṟappiṭukaiyilk kuḻi nūṟṟiṉāl Iṟukkum nellu Aṟukalamum Iṉṉilattāl varuvaṉavum Ittirupperuntuṟai Āvuṭaiyārkku Iṟaiyili ceytu kuṭut tamaikkum Iṟukkum nellukkut talaimāṟu Iraṭṭiyāka
koṇṭu tanta nilakkuḻi Irunūṟum kaiykkoṇṭamaikkum Uṭaiyār tirukkoṭikāvuṭaiya nāyaṉār tirunaṭaimāḷikaiyile kallum veṭṭi Ittirupperuntuṟai Āvuṭaiyār śrīkoyilile Innilak kuḻi nūṟṟiṉāl nellu Aṟukalattu
kkum Iṟaiyili ceytu kuṭuttamaikkum nellukku Iraṭṭiyāka paṟṟi tirunāmattakāṇiyāka koṇṭu tanta viḷainilak kuḻi Irunūṟum kaikoṇṭamaikkum tirupperuntuṟai Āvuṭai yār tirumatuḷile kalveṭṭik kuṭukkakkaṭavatākavum cammatittu
Iṟaimuṟaimai tiṭṭuk kuṭuttamaikku Uṭaiyār tirukkoṭikāvuṭaiyārkku tiruppaṇikku Uṭalāka tanta kācu nūṟṟuAimpatu Ikkācu nūṟṟuaimpatum Iṉṉāyaṉār kak koṇṭu Iṟaimuṟaimait tiṭṭuk kuṭuttom . Ittiru
pperuntuṟai Āvuṭaiyārai Eḻuntaruḷuvitta maṉuvuruṭaiyār varantarum kūttapperu māḷukku . Uṭaiyār tirukkoṭikāvuṭaiyār koyil Āticaṇṭeśvaratevar kaṉmikaḷom . Ippaṭikku Ivai koyilkaṇakkaṉ kaṇṇamaṅkalamuṭaiyāṉ śrīmā
heśvarappiriyaṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭikku Ivai tevarkaṉmi ko ppaṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai tevarkaṉmi tirucciṟṟampalappaṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭikku śrīkāriyam ka ṭaiyāṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭikku Ivai Ikkoyil caiyvācāriyam te
varājapaṇṭitaṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭikku Ivai periyanampi paṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭikku Ivai tiru ñāṉacampantaṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭikku Ivai tirucciṟṟampalapaṭṭaṉ makaṉ Āvu yaṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭikku Ivai śrīmāheśvarakkaṇkāṇi koṭṭāṟu
ṭaiyāṉ tiruñāṉacampantaṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭikku Ivai tevarkaṉmi Uttamapaṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ kaḷattuṭaiyāṉ puliyūrnāṭṭu viḻupparaiyaṉeṉ .
Digital edition of SII 12.222 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
